content: Non-White is a required miniboss fight, and one of Yellowbrow's four disciples that you can encounter in Chapter 3 of Black Myth Wukong. This Yaoguai Chief is sent to block your progress into the Valley of Ecstasy, but you'll need to fight him twice to defeat this foe.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Non-White.md', within the main section titled 'Non-White'.
The content is as follows:
Non-White is a required miniboss fight, and one of Yellowbrow's four disciples that you can encounter in Chapter 3 of Black Myth Wukong. This Yaoguai Chief is sent to block your progress into the Valley of Ecstasy, but you'll need to fight him twice to defeat this foe.
